downpour.config.title: Downpour Settings
downpour.config.disclaimer: The distribution should return values clamped between 0.0 and 1.0; higher values correspond to stronger rain storms
downpour.config.distribution.tooltip: The type of distribution to use for rain strength
downpour.config.argument1.tooltip: For Beta/Gamma distributions, this is alpha. For normal, this is the mean.
downpour.config.argument2.tooltip: For Beta/Gamma distributions, this is beta. For normal, this is the standard deviation.
